items.message:
High tides, strong winds and large waves tomorrow, Sunday 7th September, may lead to flooding. Flooding is possible around the high tide between 6:45 - 10:21am on Sunday 07/09/2025.

Areas most at risk are coastal roads and footpaths and frontages around South Pier and the Lifeboat Station in Bridlington. Further flooding is possible on Sunday evening around the high tide between 5:30 - 8:30pm. 

We are closely monitoring the situation and do not expect the situation to escalate. Be careful along beaches, promenades, coastal footpaths and roads as large waves and sea spray could be dangerous.

This message will be updated by 8:00am on 07/09/2025, or as the situation changes.
